title: 174 Designers on Their Spring/Summer Inspirations
text:
It’s that time! To kick off New York Fashion Week, the Cut asked 174 designers to choose just one word and one image to describe their new collections, giving us a mood-board preview of what we’ll see on the runways. This season, identity and self-empowerment are being celebrated by designers like Kate Spade, Sally LaPointe, and No Sesso, who chose “self-expression,” “power,” and “resilience.”

For many of the other designers on the list, dreamy images served as inspiration — paired with words like “superbloom” from Carolina Herrera, “age of possibilities” from Zero + Maria Cornejo, and “Moana” from Christian Cowan. Click ahead to see exclusive sketches and images from Tory Burch, Ulla Johnson, Christian Siriano, and many, many more.
description: New York Fashion Week designers share one photo and one word that inspired their spring/summer 2020 collections.
